tool_description: This API provides 93 voices in 39 languages using 2 speech engines, leveraging deep learning technologies to synthesize natural-sounding human speech. It allows developers to easily integrate text-to-speech (TTS) capabilities into their applications.

api_list.name: Synthesize Speech
api_list.description: This endpoint synthesizes speech from the provided text input, allowing for the generation of audio output in various voices and languages.
